attributes.additional_details:
Nottingham's oldest and best loved independent cinema is facing a situation that could put its future in serious jeopardy.

We are calling on Savoy Customers, old and new, to help us take action and SAVE SAVOY CINEMA.

Historically, Savoy Cinema has had 30 parking spaces allocated to patrons, but we have now been advised that only two parking bays will be retained, solely for the use of disabled customers.

Loyal customers of Savoy Cinema who travel by car will no longer be able to park, restricting trade to customers within walking distances or with access to public transport routes.

Inevitably, this will have a massive impact on attendance so we're calling on you, lovers of Savoy Cinema, to sign this e-petition against the proposed plans and support Savoy's future.

We want the Nottingham City Council to alter the proposed scheme to include parking at Savoy Cinema so we can continue to operate as an independent business.
